revised_title: Mahler's Theory of Irreducible Star Bodies and Set Reduction
tldr: The authors extend Mahler's theory of irreducible star bodies and set reduction by modifying the definitions and expanding the class of sets considered. They prove that any bounded reducible star set contains a closed irreducible star set with the same critical determinant, and they also show that if the original set is bounded by a finite number of algebraic surfaces, the irreducible set will also be bounded by a finite number of algebraic surfaces.
